```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(crimedata)
library(leaflet.extras)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
homicide_data_c = get_crime_data(years = 2018, cities = "Chicago")
homicide_data_a = get_crime_data(years = 2018, cities = "Austin")
homicide_data_n = get_crime_data(years = 2018, cities = "New York")
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Heat Map of Homicides in Chicago

```{r}
leaflet(homicide_data_c) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addHeatmap(lng = ~longitude, lat = ~latitude, radius = 8)
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Heat Map of Homicides in Austin

```{r}

  addHeatmap(lng = ~longitude, lat = ~latitude, radius = 8)
```
